import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Signup = () => { const [register,setRegister] = useState({username:"",name:"",email:"",password:"",confirm_password:""}); const {username,name,email,password,re_password} = register const handleClear = () => { setRegister({username:"",name:"",email:"",password:"",re_password:""}); } const handleSubmit = () => { console.log(register); } const handleChange = (e) => { console.log() const feedRegisterForm = {...register, [e.target.name]:e.target.value} setRegister(feedRegisterForm) console.log(register) } return (
